answerText: Mahabharata[10] Because the Pandavas lose a dice game, this happens to them. In the Ramayana, Kaikeyi attempts to control the succession to the throne of Ayodhya by forcing it upon King Dasaratha's son.
heading: ACF Regionals |2013 | Editors 2 | 20 | Literature | Classical | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The longest portion of this work is the "Book of Peace," or Shanti Parva. For 10 points each: [10] Name this Sanskrit epic written by Vyasa, much of which focuses on the Pandava prince Arjuna.
